title: System-level feasibility analysis of a novel chemical looping combustion integrated with electrochemical CO2 reduction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3688-3703
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00770K, Paper
Nimish Pankhedkar, Rohan Sartape, Meenesh R. Singh, Ravindra Gudi, Pratim Biswas, Suresh Bhargava
A schematic of an integrated polygeneration process combining chemical looping combustion with electrochemical CO2 reduction to produce electric power and ethylene.
